component.name: TCPU
component.version: CMO内部使用，商用发布不用关注，设备不会显示

features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新灵动胶囊支持美团外卖和百度骑行导航显示，优化通知栏部分应用图标显示效果，修复YOYO助理语音唤醒失败问题，推荐您进行更新。
支持美团、美团外卖和百度骑行导航显示（注：美团App需升级至12.21.405及以上版本、美团外卖App需升级至8.28.3及以上版本、百度地图App需升级至20.2.0.1390及以上版本）。
优化通知栏部分应用图标显示效果。
修复部分场景YOYO助理语音唤醒失败问题。
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份。 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用。 3. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持。

Dear user, in this recommended update, Magic Capsule displays Meituan Delivery and Baidu Map for cycling navigation. This release also optimizes the display effect of certain icons on the notification panel, and fixes the Voice Wakeup error in YOYO Assistant.

Magic Capsule now displays Meituan, Meituan Delivery and Baidu Map for cycling navigation (Note: Meituan needs to be upgraded to 12.21.405 or above, Meituan Delivery to 8.28.3 or above, Baidu Maps to 20.2.0.1390 or above).
Optimizes the display effect of certain icons on the notification panel.
Fixes the Voice Wakeup error in YOYO Assistant in some scenarios.

1. Installing this update will not erase your personal data, but a backup beforehand is still recommended. 2. Check out more information on product features in the Tips app. 3. If you encounter any problem during use, please get support by going to My HONOR or visiting our website: https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us.
